channel.title: Patcher Issue (monitor setting)
channel.description:
Hello,
I discovered a strange behaviour while shareing a Patch wit a lot of Patcher-Objects included. Usually I am using two monitors when I am working with the Axoloi-Patcher. On the first I've the main patch, on the second i m editing the patcher objects.
Now I discovered after sharing the patches, that this monitor setting is also stored in the axo file, with the effect that if someone using a different monitor - setting (a single) the sub-patches will be empty or not open (or outside of the visible area)
I this a known issue?
Chhers MArcus

item.title: Patcher Issue (monitor setting)
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

yes, i have heard of this before. multi monitor setups cause this kind of problems

Read full topic

Hello,

I discovered a strange behaviour while shareing a Patch wit a lot of Patcher-Objects included.
Usually I am using two monitors when I am working with the Axoloi-Patcher. On the first I've the main patch, on the second i m editing the patcher objects.

Now I discovered after sharing the patches, that this monitor setting is also stored in the axo file, with the effect that if someone using a different monitor - setting (a single) the sub-patches will be empty or not open (or outside of the visible area)

I this a known issue?
